content: introducing the granny stripe skirt pattern by carroway crochet this pattern is free on my blog 1 there is a video tutorial 2 for this pattern left and right handed versions the granny stripe skirt is perfect for summer days on the beach and it looks great when worn with leggings as well the pattern is written for sizes xs to 5x this skirt is very stretchy so fits a variety of sizes you can make this skirt with your choice of worsted weight yarn either acrylic or cotton just look for the number 4 on the yarn label it is a great pattern for using up your extra stash of yarn it is a beginner crochet pattern with easy-to-follow instructions it is in us terms 1 https //carrowaycrochet com/granny-stripe-skirt-free-crochet-pattern-how-to-crochet-a-granny-stripe-skirt/ 2 https //youtu be/rl_waxqfcym si=-2z_xvuisvh86iis
